mapper.insert: insert into dss_workspace_associate_git (workspace_id, git_user, git_password, git_token, git_url, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, type, git_user_id) VALUES (#{workspaceId}, #{gitUser}, #{gitPassword}, #{gitToken}, #{gitUrl}, now(), now(), #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{type}, #{gitUserId})
mapper.update:
update dss_workspace_associate_git
git_user = #{gitUser},
git_password = #{gitPassword},
git_token = #{gitToken},
git_user_id = #{gitUserId},
update_by = #{updateBy},
where workspace_id = #{workspaceId} and type = #{type}
mapper.select: select id, workspace_id, git_user, git_token, git_password, git_url, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, type, git_user_id from dss_workspace_associate_git where workspace_id = #{workspaceId} and `type` = #{type} limit 1
